articles.author: Miriam Jordan
articles.title: 50 Years After Vietnam, Thousands Flee Another Lost American War - The New York Times
articles.description: The United States admitted more than 300,000 Southeast Asians after the Vietnam War. Analysts say there is little chance the country will repeat the extensive refugee resettlement effort.
